short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: BossHub Event | Sidebar, A multi-vendor event ticket booking platform

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
BossHub Event | Sidebar, A multi-vendor event ticket booking platform

Features:
✅ Online Events
✅ Venue Events
✅ Ticket Variations
✅ Low Commission Rate
✅ PWA Ticket Scanner
✅ Support Tickets

Administrators and vendors/organizers can upload venues/online events. Admins can receive a commission for each event booking. Evento offers different types of tickets - Free, Variable Tickets, No Stock Variable Tickets. It also supports single and multiple date events. 
It also offers multi-language and RTL front-end website, single language admin/organizer dashboard translation option, early bird discounts per ticket, taxes, coupons, PWA ticket scanner, admin e-commerce, reports, transaction reports, monthly revenue reports, push notifications, add to yahoo/google calendar, event countdowns!
